query.text: Where was the robot localized at the time of grasp?

query.q:
findall([Obj, E], 
 ((task_end(T,E), task_class(T,knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), returned_value(T, Obj))), 
 Objs),!, member([Obj, E], Objs), belief_at(loc(Obj,Loc), E), 
 add_object_as_semantic_instance(Obj, Loc, E, SemanticMapInstance), 
 add_object_with_children(SemanticMapInstance).
query.text: Where were the objects perceived during the execution?

query.q: task(T), task_goal(T, '(OBJECT-PLACED-AT ?OBJ ?LOC)'), task_start(T, S), task_end(T, E), add_trajectory('/base_link', S, E, '1').

query.text: Stop publishing trajectories to the scene

query.q:
Labels = ['ManipulationPoseUnreachable', 'ObjectNotFound', 'ManipulationFailed', 'LocationNotReached', 'ObjectLost', 'ManipulationPoseOccupied'],findall(N, (
member(Error, Labels),
    findall(E, (failure_class(E, C), string_concat('http://ias.cs.tum.edu/kb/knowrob.owl#', Error, C)), List), length(List, N)
  ),
Occurence),
add_diagram(iderror, 'error distribution', barchart, xlabel, ylabel, '210', '210', '12px', [[Labels,Occurence]]).
query.text: Show occurences of typical error types in bar or donut chart

query.q: findall(FailClass,(task_class(T, knowrob:'PerformOnProcessModule'), failure_task(F, T), failure_class(F, FailClass)), FailReasons).
query.text: Which were common problems for a certain task type?

query.q:
assert((
  tasktree(Task, List):-
    findall(Subsub,
      (
        subtask(Task, Sub),
        tasktree(Sub, Subsub)
      ),
      Sublist),
    List = [Task, Sublist]
)).
query.text: Assert tasktree rule (needed for following query, only invoke once)

query.q:
Root = 'http://ias.cs.tum.edu/kb/cram_log.owl#CRAMAction_m2XW5s7U',
tasktree(Root, List), flatten(List, Flat), once(maplist( \X^Node^(((subtask(P, X), Parent = P); Parent = X), ((returned_value(X, Value), Color = red); Color = green),
atom_concat('Name: ', X, Namestring),
atom_concat('Parent: ', Parent, Parentstring),
Node = [[X, Parent, Color],[Namestring, Parentstring, Color]]), Flat, Nodes)), add_diagram(tree, title, treechart, xlabel, ylabel, '960', '500', '12px', Nodes).
query.text: Show tasks and subtasks as a tree (adjust root node)
